title: Kerokero Keroppi no Christmas Eve no Okurimono

synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: The Christmas Eve Gift
Keroppi and Friends: The Christmas Eve Gift
alternative_titles.en: Keroppi in the Christmas Eve Gift
alternative_titles.ja: けろけろけろっぴのクリスマス・イブのおくりもの

synopsis: A star who tries to act like an adult falls from the sky. Keroppi helps nurse it back to health and regain its confidence to shine once again.
